TopicTitle: why not always use vernor engines rather than monopropellant-based RCS engines?

Articles.Content: when i'm making this ship i don't understand why i wouldn't just put vernor engines on it for translation rather than monoprop engines, because that would require me to take up extra space with monopropellant tanks. so why aren't all RCS thrusters done with vernor engines? (assuming the ship uses liq/ox fuel)
